make sure conda is deactivated!

uv init --name ggrep --package --app --build-backend hatch --python 3.12 xgrep

uv build
uv publish

uv run ggrep

uv add pytest --dev

uv run pytest

uv run ruff check

## Install nox so you can run it directly, without uv tool run nox
uv tool install nox
